mapper.sql: id, username, password, enabled, remark, employee_id
mapper.insert:

id,

password,
enabled,
remark,
employee_id,

username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
